column4: can some one help me, i just check if the iso file i burn match the hash and i did, so whats the next step
when i install the ubuntu 8.10 it gave me an error 18
On boot?  That's a grub error.
I'd suggest reading GRU Bdocs, I'm not entirely familiar, but there's a breakdown of what those mean.  I think in general it's that the drive wasn't properly accessed.
